experiences.description: Developed and maintained backend services using Java and Spring. Contributed to the design and implementation of REST APIs. Worked closely with senior engineers to improve code quality and performance.

Designed, developed, and deployed microservices using Spring Boot and Docker. Implemented data pipelines using Kafka. Collaborated with frontend engineers to integrate backend services. Responsible for code reviews and mentoring junior engineers.

Led a team of engineers in the development of a new cloud-based platform. Architected and implemented key features of the platform using Kubernetes and PostgreSQL. Improved system performance and scalability through optimization of database queries and caching strategies. Responsible for technical decisions and mentoring team members. Integrated CI/CD pipelines.

education.description: Specialized in Software Engineering. Focused on distributed systems and algorithms. Completed a thesis on "Performance Optimization of Distributed Databases".
Completed coursework in data structures, algorithms, and programming languages. Participated in several programming competitions.
